ch0294_00_grusha/7101_0701_01_10:
Battles are like mountains in winter—the situation
can change in a heartbeat.
ch0294_00_grusha/7101_0701_02_10:
Even if you think you have the upper hand, you
could be backed into a corner before you know it.
ch0294_00_grusha/7101_0701_03_10:
Battle with a naive mindset, and you might just be
one false step from a steep fall.
ch0294_00_grusha/7102_0701_01_10:
This applies to any profession, but if there’s one
way to describe the difference between a pro and
an amateur...
ch0294_00_grusha/7102_0701_02_10:
it’s whether you’re fully prepared or not for what’s
to come.
ch0294_00_grusha/7102_0701_03_10:
If you’re not ready for a world where you're
expected to show results, you won’t make it as
a pro.
ch0294_00_grusha/7102_0701_04_10: In that sense, you’re probably a pro.
ch0294_00_grusha/7103_0701_01_10:
It’s probably better to have lots of dreams
and goals.
ch0294_00_grusha/7103_0701_02_10:
When you only have one dream, and you have to
let that dream go...
ch0294_00_grusha/7103_0701_03_10:
that’s really hard for anyone to get over... Doesn’t
matter who you are.
ch0294_00_grusha/7104_0701_01_10:
You need to be extra cautious when things are
going well.
ch0294_00_grusha/7104_0701_02_10:
Pitfalls are usually close by. They’re just hard
to see.
ch0294_00_grusha/7105_0701_01_10:
How long has it been since you started having
Pokémon battles, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0294_00_grusha/7105_0701_02_10:
Must be a new and exciting time if it hasn’t been
that long.
ch0294_00_grusha/7105_0701_03_10: But that’s also when you’re on thin ice.
ch0294_00_grusha/7105_0701_04_10:
It’s always the most dangerous when you’re just
starting to get the hang of things.
ch0294_00_grusha/1701_0701_01_10: Good timing. Take this with you.
ch0294_00_grusha/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s a token of my appreciation... Is it uncool to
say that?
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0701_01_10:
The smallest change can throw your life right off
course, easy as that.
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0701_02_10:
Just like when I had to give up on my path as
a snowboarder.
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0701_03_10:
But recently, I’ve been thinking about how I can
tackle a new path.
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0701_04_10:
I’ve learned that it’s important to think about
these things.
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0702_01_10:
There’s no point in me brooding on what I
should’ve done differently in the past.
ch0294_00_grusha/2501_0702_02_10:
As long as there’s an open path ahead, I just need
to keep moving forward.
ch0294_00_grusha/2511_0701_01_10:
My motivation as a Gym Leader was frozen over
up until recently...
ch0294_00_grusha/2511_0701_02_10:
But I had a battle with a challenger who rekindled
my passion.
ch0294_00_grusha/2511_0702_02_10:
I truly feel that’s what makes you strive for the
future, no matter what challenges you face.
ch0294_00_grusha/2511_0702_03_10: Sorry, I might’ve brought the temperature down.
ch0294_00_grusha/3001_0701_01_10:
You seem to have a lot of energy in the morning.
I’m starting to feel the fire of your passion, too.
ch0294_00_grusha/3003_0701_01_10:
Do as much as you can while the sun is out,
before the day passes you by.
ch0294_00_grusha/3005_0701_01_10: It can get chilly at night, so take care of yourself.
